title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Establish the project's objectives, desired features, performance criteria, and compatibility requirements.

title: Develop Thought Pattern Recognition Algorithm
description: Create an algorithm capable of interpreting and understanding thought patterns.

title: Design User Interface for Thought Input
description: Create an intuitive and efficient user interface for thought input.

title: Implement Thought Pattern Recognition System
description: Integrate the thought pattern recognition algorithm into a functional system.

title: Integrate Speech Synthesis Engine
description: Connect a speech synthesis engine to produce audible output based on interpreted thought patterns.

title: Test and Optimize Performance of Synthesizer
description: Optimize the system for efficient speech synthesis with minimal latency.

title: Ensure Data Privacy and Security Compliance
description: Implement security measures to safeguard user data and maintain privacy.

title: Document System Functionality and Capabilities
description: Create comprehensive documentation detailing the device's features and usage.
dependencies: Test and Optimize Performance of Synthesizer
